faqPage.title: Frequently asked questions
faqPage.intro: Find answers to the most common questions about using Pad'Up. If you can't find your answer, you can contact us.
faqPage.q1: How do I book a court on Pad'Up?
faqPage.a1: Simply select a club, choose an available time slot and confirm the booking. The process is quick and takes just a few clicks.
faqPage.q2: Do I need to create an account to book?
faqPage.a2: Yes, creating an account is required to book a court and manage your bookings.
faqPage.a3: Yes, availabilities shown on Pad'Up are updated in real time to avoid double bookings.
faqPage.a4: Booking via Pad'Up is free for players. Any payments depend on the club's conditions.
faqPage.a5: Yes, you can cancel from your space. Conditions depend on each club.
faqPage.q6: How can a club join Pad'Up?
faqPage.a6: Clubs can contact us via the Contact page to explore platform integration.
faqPage.q7: Is Pad'Up only for independent clubs?
faqPage.a7: Pad'Up primarily targets independent clubs, but is open to any structure sharing the same vision.
faqPage.q8: What to do if there's a problem?
faqPage.a8: If you have an issue, you can contact the Pad'Up team via the Contact page. We will do our best to help you quickly.

contact.reponseRapide: We do our best to respond quickly.

contact.coordonneesProchainement: Exact contact details will be provided shortly.
contact.engagementDesc: We favor simple, clear and effective exchanges.

aPropos.title: About Pad'Up
aPropos.intro: Pad'Up is a French platform designed to simplify padel court booking. Our goal is clear: enable players to find and book a court in seconds, and help clubs manage their availability simply, without unnecessary complexity.
aPropos.pourquoiDesc1: Padel is growing rapidly, but booking often remains complicated: unintuitive platforms, outdated information, poorly synchronized availability.
aPropos.pourquoiDesc2: Pad'Up was born from this observation. We wanted to create a fluid, fast and reliable solution, designed for both players and clubs.
aPropos.reserverClics: Book a slot in a few clicks
aPropos.plusDeJeu: Less searching, fewer constraints, more playing.
aPropos.prioriteClubs: Our priority is to offer an effective solution, adapted to real-world needs.
aPropos.solutionDesc1: Pad'Up is a project developed in France, with particular attention to quality, simplicity and user experience.
aPropos.solutionDesc2: We are building Pad'Up step by step, with a long-term vision: to become a reliable reference for padel booking.

faq.q1: How do I book a court?
faq.a1: Simply search for a club, select your preferred time slot and confirm your booking. You will receive an immediate confirmation by email.
faq.a2: Yes, you pay directly at the club. No credit card is required when booking online, which ensures maximum security.
faq.a3: Yes, you can cancel your booking from your personal space. Cancellation conditions depend on each club and are indicated when booking.
faq.a4: No, Pad'Up is 100% free for players. You only pay the court price directly at the club.
faq.q5: How do I get match reminders?
faq.a5: You automatically receive email notifications before your bookings. You can manage your notification preferences in your profile.
